title: Jinx and Viktor: I'm a Firing Your Lazor!
body:
Sorry for being away for so long everyone.  I was busy getting ready for a Local anime convention this past two months, Sakura - con in Seattle. If anyone is going today I'm booth 613 ( I'm right by the deli in the back)

Anyways here's a new image from me.  I have also thought that {{champion:112}}  and {{champion:222}}  put off this Dexter and Dee Dee vib.  Where {{champion:112}}  always makes new inventions and {{champion:222}}  just messes things up, well because she {{champion:222}} .  Has anyone else thought this?

Ok enjoy all see everyone later and don't forget to check e out on Deviantart here: 
[](http://bryan-lobdell.deviantart.com/)

replies.body:
"Jinxy, get out of my laboratory!"

Now I want to see a story event where Jinx gets a Battlecast skin and joins forces with Viktor to tear down the fleshy world so he can rebuild it in his image...
Only if Heimer gets the Mandark treatment.
I honestly thought Jinx was, for a while, an agent sent by Viktor to mess with Vi/Cait/Jayce. She's got Zaun tech, freaky red/pink eyes and imagines blowing up robots? Theres a story there.
I really like it, especially her face! But cameltoe? Really? -_-
i personally think hiem is a better fit for dexter imo
Heimer seems like he'd have a much better sense of humor and be more tolerant to Jinx's inevitable mistakes, something Dexter probably doesn't have.
Vikter is more mandark.
That seems suitable.
And the ship begins
Cute.
So is it a jinx skin or viktor skin or... OOOH both!

This needs to be canon ASAP.

If league even has canon anymore. I don't even know.

It does.

No one still knows anything about Evelin.
That's still cannon.
Ooo, what does _this_ button do?

But Master Yi is doing Dee Dees dance....
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rEumAW7swo8
Bump.
I like it a lot, but I find her left leg to look kind of awkward, mainly her thigh. Other than that though, 10/10 amazing work
I love Jinx's face in this picture. 10/10 great job
Battlecast Jinx next?
So cool!
Lmao I love this so much it's perfect
I am at a loss. I never knew so much awesome could be condensed into such a small area. Have you emailed your findings to NASA?
Jinx is playing with viks "Lazor"
I'd watch that.
